original_title: Fishing boat with large haul of drugs seized by Navy in high seas south of Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: A coordinated intelligence operation conducted by the State Intelligence Service and Sri Lanka Navy has led to the apprehension of a local multiday fishing trawler carrying a large consignment of narcotics suspected to be heroin and 6 suspects.
The apprehension was made by SLNS Vijayabahu in the high seas south of Sri Lanka.
Meanwhile, the drug-carrying vessel and suspects are expected to be brought to the port of Colombo today (18th May) for onward action.
